text: nabiye, ni visvasikale yud'dhattin preatsahippikkuka. ninnalute kuttattil ksamasilaraya irupat peruntayirunnal irunur pere avarkk jayiccatakkavunnatan‌. ninnalute kuttattil nur peruntayirunnal satyanisedhikalil ninn ayiram pere avarkk jayiccatakkavunnatan‌. avar karyam grahikkatta oru janavibhagaman ennatukeantatre at‌
